CustomField.formula: IF( TEXT(Project_Name__r.Project_type__c) != 'Repair & Alteration - Work Item Detail',((ECCA__c *(1+ Project_Name__r.Construction_Contingency__c))*(1+ Project_Name__r.Art_In_Architecture__c)), ((RA_ECCA__c *(1+ Project_Name__r.Construction_Contingency__c))*(1+ Project_Name__r.Art_In_Architecture__c)) )
CustomField.label: ECC
